entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in R2R compilation time #100995
  • AddIniFile Not found! #100992
  • Arm64/Sve: The scaling of immediate in ldr and other instructions should take into account variable VL #100991
  • SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo throws an exception if compared to null #100990
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.FactorySha1Tests.HashAlgorithm_TransformBlockAndDispose_ConcurrentUseDoesNotCrashProcess fails #100983
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests.BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs #100979
  • [wasm] 'emcmake' is not recognized as an internal or external command, #100973
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ConnectionAttemptCanceled_AuthorityNotBlocked #100971
  • CompileToAssembly_SimpleUseInDebug test failure on windows amd64 #100964
  • [API Proposal]: Add ISOCurrencySymbol to NumberFormat and use it when parsing numbers #100959
  • [browser][hybrid][firefox] RangeError: invalid value "Cyrl" for option region #100955
  • [Mono] Deadlock during the GC stop-the-world phase when dotnet is embedded into a native application. #100953
    9.0.0
  • System.TypeLoadException from static field #100950
  • Issue with Options having an array property that is added twice #100948
  • runtime-libraries stress-* build definitions are failing in release/6.0 #100944
    9.0.0
  • `!pe` in windbg does not print first chance exception details #100943

Closed

  • JIT assert "(structBaseType != TYP_STRUCT) && (genTypeSize(structBaseType) >= originalSize)" failing in superpmi-collect #90944
    9.0.0
  • Follow up issue. We should probably never see a BBJ_ALWAYS block ending with a throw. #100458
    9.0.0
  • iOS: Breakpoint not hit in classes containing static fields that are initialized inline #100243
    9.0.0
  • Custom JsonSerializer with System.Text cannot handle non-finite floating point literals. #100952
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests.BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs(limit: 14398736) [FAIL] #100977
  • Timeout of ConnectionAttemptCanceled_AuthorityNotBlocked #100972
  • High memory consumption using X509Certificate2 GetNameInfo((X509NameType.UpnName, false) #99933
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Dependency analysis support for generic method reflection #81204
    9.0.0
  • [9.0-preview.1] Test process crash on Windows in Release mode with task throwing an exception #99187
  • Event log shows 5011 for sharepoint IIS log after the CU #99581
  • Toolchain setup on contributing workflow could be updated for Linux #69058
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix erroneous readonly on a mutable struct #100996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assert when using HashProviderCng concurrently #100989
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove regex tests blocking on async calls #100982
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][android] Run Linux Bionic runtime tests instead of libraries #100980
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100978
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Pass existing credscan suppression file to SDL scan #100976
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fixed printing jump destinations in disassembler on release #100967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Run MsQuic tests in parallel. #100947
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update SDK to preview 3 release #100945
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update Mariner 2.0 to Azure Linux 3.0 #100942
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove Win7 Helix queues #100981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Force TLS1.2 in update-machine-certs.ps1 #100987
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve performance on virtual method processing #100897
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow helper calls that always throw to be marked as no-return #100900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use wix 3.14.1-8722.20240403.1 #100889
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Add SVE feature detection for Windows #100937
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Merge internal policy baseline commit to public #100974
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100795
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.30
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100793
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.5
  • Update pull request/issue management bot configuration #100965
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Disable HTTP/3 LargeSingleHeader_ThrowsException Test Again #100956
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't emit analyzer warnings for MakeGeneric understood by ILC #100858
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WIP] Update entry assembly #100935
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: verify full profile consistency after importation #100869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip cleanup of eventpipe for mono to prevent crashes on shutdown #100938
    area-Tracing-mono, 9.0.0
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads #100898
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding missed synchronization #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add apt -y autoremove to our setup steps to keep machines clean. #100936
    area-Infrastructure
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Add new line to be specified for JSON formatting #100890
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [mini] Use atomics, instead of loader lock, for JIT wrappers #100925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow debuggers to see first chance exceptions #100854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160

Closed

  • PublishTrimmed build time regression. #40060

PullRequests

Created

  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add nuget-team as CODEOWNER for dotnet-list-package #40139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Update warning message for containers package detection when building SDK-containerizable project types #39956
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync fails with the new slnx files #73004
  • `RequiresVariableReceiver` should likely check for "not a reference type" instead of checking for "is a value type" #73003
  • SyntaxTokenParser API Additions #73002
  • Formatter doesn't work correctly for nested collection initializers #72992
  • Refactoring suggestion: remove using #72991

Closed

  • csc.exe exited with code -2146232797 when using primary constructor with event in interface #72981

PullRequests

Created

  • Use helper for creating KeyValuePairs. #73007
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused using #73006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Experiment with array creation. (part2) #73005
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Partial properties 1 #72999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support intercepting invocation within conditional access #72998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Experiment with array creation. #73000
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • PR feedback on syncing. #72996
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use a frozendictionary on net-core and a readonly one on netfx #72995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify ForAttributeWithMetadataName #72979
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup in solution-sync code. #72990
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a unit test to cover the unified setting's registration file. #72946
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use the new Solution.AddProjects instead of adding projects to the solution individually #72994
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2428680 #72988
    auto-merge
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Sync project level info in parallel. #72976
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Sync small-sized information across all projects in one batch call. #72975
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix returning valid pp symbol info on unrelated preprocessor directives #72910
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
  • Add Hot Reload brokered service registration #72989
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide more information in error #55107
  • You broke Blazor with RenderMode #55104
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #55094

Closed

  • WasmBrowser and RCL projects fail based on alphabetic ordering of names #55105
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55095
  • Clannel.Reader.WaitToReadAsync() blocks subsequent requests to the action for 20 seconds #55099
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer to 8.0.4 causing issues #55075
  • Issue with Options having an array property that is added twice #55096
  • Perf regression: mvc #55074

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update Wix version #55103
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update Wix version #55101
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Update Wix version #55102
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24207.7 #55011
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0af9766` to `b1a777f` #55100
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Wix version #55088
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Widespread memory leak propagation in visual trees #21809
  • App crashes when it has a button with FontImageSource in version 8.0.20 #21808
    .NET 8 SR4
  • XML Serializer does not work correctly in "net8.0-ios" release mode #21803
  • [Tests] UITests need a more discoverable way to connect the unit test to the page under test #21802
  • Webview events fire different on iOS and Android #21800
  • [Android] Infinite arrange loop from VerticalStackLayoutManager.ArrangeChildren #21798
  • `WinUI` unknown exception when running as `Project` instead of `MsixPackage` #21794
  • .net 8 ObservableCollection Add method issue #21791

Closed

  • Changing CarouselView Position has no effect until it is set >0 and back to 0 when loop is disabled #9749

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/keyboard
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Fix weak UITest #21796
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Extend NativeAOT Templates tests to cover all supported platforms #21793
  • `LayoutHandler.Windows`: Store children to a local variable #21792
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Updated

  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR5
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21718
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, .NET 8 SR4

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider allowing non-shared (ad-hoc) tests within regular QueryTestBase classes #33526
  • Can't use complex type that has no properties (but has nested types) #33525
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] in Check helper methods #33523
  • SQLite: Querying on byte[] JSON property doesn't work #33522
  • Comprehensive relational type testing for both serialization and querying #33521
  • ExecuteNonQuery_throws_when_busy_with_returning failed #33520

Closed

  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - MaxIdentifierLength is not being honored for Table names #30196
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Short URL used in error message not definied: efcore-docs-sqlserver-save-changes-and-output-clause #33519
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Explicitly selecting properties from JSON OwnedCollection crashes on OrderBy #33360

PullRequests

Created

  • testing #33529
  • Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality #33527
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524

Merged

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • Make sure table name inferred from DbSet name is has proper length based on maximum length for identifiers. #33513

Updated

  • Transform JSON_VALUE() to OPENJSON/WITH for binary/varbinary #33440

entry.content:
